1.content:
Brian sighed to himself as he walked through the park, wishing he had something positive to think about. It was a bit depressing to take his nightly walk through the forest near his home if he was just going remind himself about his confidence issues. Brian tended to be on the shy and timid end of the personality scale, and it usually meant that he avoided talking to people or making himself the center of attention, or much attention at all.

Working retail had been a nightmare, and being shy and never being able to present himself confidently had lost him one job already, and he sometimes just wished that he could be somebody else, or at least someone a bit more outgoing. It wasn’t like he didn’t have friends, but he wasn’t the type to approach somebody.

He had tried the bar scene, but being unable to look anything but awkward had made that unsuccessful. In all honesty, it wasn’t that he didn’t have the looks for it, as he tried to remind himself. Tall, Short brown hair, square jaw, fit body, face that didn’t look like it had been hit by a sledgehammer, it was mostly the fact that nobody wanted to go for the guy who looked like he’d run away the moment you tried to talk to him.

Still, if he was just going to whine to himself about his problems, he felt like he shouldn’t bother coming at all, and put it out of his mind as he enjoyed the cool breeze passing by his jacket and the atmosphere of the place.

Most people would have found the place creepy at night, and not a place they’d find themselves in unless they had a flashlight and were looking for notes pinned to trees, but Brian had been coming for years, and had gotten to the point where he didn’t even bother using the torch he brought half the time, preferring the relative lack of light of the stars and moon thanks the relative lack of light-pollution compared to the rest of the town, and his night-vision to navigate around.

He figured that he had better head back, and began to head towards the footpath when he spotted a small glint in the corner of his eye on the ground, and not the normal glass glint of a discarded beer bottle. He moved closer to it, and it seemed to be some kind of necklace. Somebody’s lost jewelry? He fished it out of the thick grass, and instead of jewelry, it was a circular rock with a hook on the end and a circle cut out of the middle on a necklace with two large pearl-like balls on it, and for some reason it reminded him of something.

He stared at it for a second before remembering what it was. A magatama, he believed? That was the correct name for it, right? It actually reminded him of the one worn by a character in the Ace Attorney series, and come to think of it, the necklace looked exactly the same, as far as he could remember, what with the color and the extra balls next to it on the necklace. Probably just a coincidence, he thought to himself. He couldn’t imagine why you’d have a replica of it though, it wasn’t exactly like magatamas were a popular fashion accessory. Or at least the last time he checked, he wasn’t big on fashion.
1.title: The Park

111.content:
He supposed he should probably give it to the police or something in case it was valuable, but he couldn’t exactly do that in the middle of the night. And it was a bit too big for his jeans’ pockets, so he put it around his neck, feeling a bit self-conscious despite the empty park. He was ready to tear it off if anybody came near when he began to feel very odd in a way he couldn’t quite explain, like his skin was trying to move on its own volition.

He tried to ignore the feeling, but it got stronger as he went on until he started to feel sick to his stomach and doubled over, a sharp spike of pain going through him. He let out a slightly high-pitched yelp as it hit him, leaving as quickly as it came, Brian panting as he brought himself back up. What the hell was that? If that happened again, he’d probably have to go check himself into a hospital or something, and in the middle of the night too…

He brushed a bit of hair out of his eyes, the sensation of it bothering him, before he realised that his hair wasn’t long enough to even touch his eyebrows, let alone his eyes. And was his hand smaller than usual, or was he just crazy? In fact, everything seemed slightly smaller… It was probably just an effect of whatever had affected him before, he reasoned, ignoring his slight lack of balance as he wandered through the taller than usual trees.

He felt the long grass brush up against his ankles, which was odd, since he was wearing jeans and perfectly normal shoes, and hadn’t felt anything before. One of the legs must have been pushed up. He looked down and bent over to correct the issue, before staring in amazement at the sight of his jeans’ legs slowly receding upwards, already starting to approach his knees, looking more like shorts at this point.

Even crazier than that was the fact that his leg hairs were quickly disappearing, leaving smooth legs that, by the look of them, were growing thinner, Brian able to feel them growing more slender, a slightly painful feeling as his bones and muscles rearranged themselves. Even his shoes were melting away, the heel growing thicker and blacker as the entire top half disappeared save for the usual straps of a pair of sandals, leaving a pair of black sandals adorning his suddenly smaller and daintier feet.

At this point, Brian was starting to panic. Whatever the hell was going on had to be a hallucination, or a crazy virus, or something, clothes didn’t just disappear like that. And what was happening to his leg? Whatever was happening, he was clearly not well, and he resolved to get to a hospital as quickly as possible.

However, he took a brief glance down again, and to his dismay he saw his jacket quickly shrinking away on the front, growing looser around his hips as the sleeves shrank back to just past his elbows, growing larger and more open, the material seemingly changing to a softer one. A quick look at his shoulders revealed that the back was perfectly intact, but from just past his shoulders down the jacket failed to cover his entire front half, and seemed to be turning a deep purple.

Do the mental changes begin?
111.title: The beginning

1111.content:
Brian almost discarded the altered article of clothing as he stumbled onwards, for some reason stopping himself before he could take it off. And for some reason he was glad that he had stopped himself. After all, he liked this jacket. Why did he like this jacket? It was really more of a weird coat now anyway, which was kind of neat.

Wondering between worried thoughts about why he was just accepting his new coat-thing, he almost bumped into a park-bench, starting to reach the outskirts of the forest. He sat down onto it, trying to calm down and figure out just what was going on, almost burying his head in his hands before he noticed how much smaller they were now.

OK, so unless it was a hallucination, clothes didn’t just change on their own, and something was going on with his body. Again putting aside hallucination, it couldn’t be some weird disease. Which left what, magic? Aliens? He ignored the part of his brain telling him to look for a more down-to-earth explanation, and thought back. What had started this? He was feeling fine today before now, and it all started right after… His eyes rolled down to the magatama on the necklace he was wearing. Was it that? No, that was stupid, it wasn’t a magic necklace, magic didn’t exist.

But it’d be really cool if it really was a magic necklace. Some part of him thought, and before he could question why he just thought that he gave as gasp as his waist painfully cracked, pulling in as his hips pushed out, giving him what he embarrassingly admitted was a much curvier figure, his hips, while remaining fairly thin, swelling out to more feminine proportions. He also noticed that his jeans had stopped shrinking at above-his-knee height, his jacket/coat having grown longer to almost reach it, and had faded to an odd cream color, losing its denim texture.

OK, so magic, he thought to himself. He was turning into someone or something else, because of magic. That… Was kind of amazing, when he really thought about it. After all, that meant that magic really was real, and that… He stopped his slightly excited train of thought. It was like a much more excited person was talking, and he again wondered just what was happening to him.

He readjusted his position on the park bench, having apparently shrunken again while he was sitting. When he stood up, he guessed that he was at least a head or so shorter, and probably would have only barely reached the shoulders of his normal height. At this point, he found himself less panicked and more interested in where this was going, and his fingers went up to touch the supposedly magic necklace adorning his neck.

The moment he touched it, he felt a jarring pain in a very personal area, and a familiar feeling replaced with a different, more feminine one. He immediately surveyed the damage, and with no idea how to feel, acknowledged one fact to herself; she was now female. She wasn’t quite sure how to put that to herself, it sounded ridiculous even in her head, unconsciously having automatically changed pronouns when referring to herself.

Going over her changes so far, Brian realized she really only had one major part of his torso unaffected, and as if on cue, his shoulders painfully pulled closer together as her chest pushed out, nipples growing larger as pectorals turned to small but very apparent breasts, obvious through her t-shirt.

OK, so she was a girl. She had just magically turned into a girl. Magic was real and it apparently did that to her. And she wasn’t freaking out. In fact, she was kind of… OK with it? In fact, she was actually kind of excited to see what would happen to what was left, all thoughts of going to a hospital abandoned.

After a moment, her newfound patience and willingness to see the last of her changes unfold paid off, as her t-shirt seemed to merge with her jeans, the material of both growing thicker and softer, the legs of her jeans forming together into a loose skirt, the feeling of wearing what was now a dress slightly embarrassing to Brian, although one she found felt strangely natural.

The dress parted in the middle before being quickly bound by a large sash that formed around it, tying many times around it into a v-necked kimono-esque garb, the sash forming a large ribbon on the back, the color changing to a darker purple than her coat, differentiating itself from her cream dress. Underneath it a small bra formed over her breasts, and his boxers formed into a much more suitable pair of underwear for her.

Believing her changes to be complete, Brian was about to move again when she felt her face begin to contort, his lips growing slightly thicker as her nose shrank and her features rearranged themselves into a much more feminine form. Her hair darkened to a shiny black as it grew much longer, reaching almost halfway down her back, a small bun tying itself up at the top of her scalp, bound by a purple pearl-like orb similar to the ones on her necklace. Her hair straightened out into long bangs reaching almost to her eyes, while two more chest-long bangs grew down the sides, adorned with two more pearls at the ends.

After waiting another minute to see if she would change any more, her original fears completely forgotten in an excited interest in what had happened to her, she searched her clothes for any pockets, finding some on the inside of her coat, relieved to find that her phone and wallet hadn’t fallen out or disappeared. She went for her phone’s camera, but realized that it was too dark to get a clear picture, and checked her wallet for her driver’s license, wondering if it would have changed.

And even in the dim light, illuminated only by a single lamppost ten or so meters away from her, she was able to make out herself on her driver’s license, if not any of the words on it. And instead of his usual face staring back at him, it was the face of a young girl that couldn’t have been older than seventeen or eighteen, and thinking about her odd clothes and the magatama, she did seem to look like a non-anime version of the character Maya Fey, as crazy as it still sounded to her.

She meant, she had turned into a video game character, which was amazing! Was there a reason for it? Could the necklace do it again, but with somebody different? The thing was incredible! She slowed down for a second, thinking that the character of Maya had been what he was picturing while she was holding it and putting it on. Was that it? She had turned into somebody else just because she was thinking about it?

And thinking about turning into somebody else, she thought back to her problems that she had been thinking about just before she picked the magatama up. It felt like it was somebody completely different she was thinking about, and couldn’t imagine herself in any of those situations. Being shy, not being able to talk to people? She was fine at doing that! She realized that she seemed to have gone through some kind of a personality adjustment while she was changing, and she couldn’t see anything wrong with it. After all, she was who she was, right? She gave a quick smile at the thought, considering what had just happened to her. That definitely wasn’t something set in stone anymore.

She supposed she should be thinking more about what would happen to her after this, but right now, she wanted to take this new body for a test run.

What should she do?
1111.title: Continued

choices: Wait a second, people are watching!
11111.content:
Maybe get something to eat, a fast food place maybe? Hopefully nobody would pay too much attention to the fact that she was dressed like an anime character, she thought to herself as she headed back into town, looking for somewhere to get a burger.

Later...

Brian finished off her burger, wondering if she should still call herself that. Should she get a new name or something? Probably not, she thought, that was probably going too far. Besides, she’d have to figure out what was going on with her new life before that, see if it was any different. She sat back in her chair, glad that the diner was empty at the moment. She had gotten a few odd looks from the staff and the couple of customers, what with dressing like an anime character and looking a bit strange, but her youthful appearance meant that it was never raised, and they paid her no mind after she sat down.

She reviewed her situation, thinking things over. Since she was a few years younger, would she be back in school now? She had been in college when she was male, and she found the idea of having to spend another year or so back in high school a very unappealing one. Then again, she’d probably do a bit better this time around…

She stopped that train of thought, deciding to think about something more important or interesting. Here she was, having been turned into a fictional character, and she was worrying about whether or not she was back in school. Great sense of priorities, Brian.

The fictional character did bring one thing to her attention. Maya Fey was a medium, with the ability to spirit channel, and essentially turn into other people, albeit with a few complications. Did that mean she could do that too? Was that something her necklace could do? Hell, it was worth a shot, wouldn’t be any stranger than what had already happened.

11111221111121211112.content: Now that Felicia was settled in her new, permanent form, it was time to get her life on track. Over the next few days, she worked hard to forge identification documents under her new name and face, completely reshopped for her apartment, and sold what she didn’t need, which ended up being most of Brian’s useless crap. In the end, she even pawned the Magatama that caused her transformations, leaving it to be bought by someone else. But who would it be?
11111221111121211112.title: A New Turnabout

choices: A male character from Ace Attorney.
A female character from Ace Attorney.
A different series is used instead.
111112211111212111122.content:
A few months after being sold for a few dollars, a teenage girl went to the same pawn shop, looking for something interesting on a weekend. She had frizzy red hair, a freckled face, and a figure that no one in her class had noticed, except to insult her for. Ginger saw the world through the thick lenses of her glasses, and had few in the way of friends. Her hopes had been low when entering the shop, but she hadn’t expected to find the Magatama.

The moment she laid eyes on it, the item had caught her attention. She loved the Ace Attorney games, just one of her many geeky passions in life, and this was a great replica of the one from the game, almost looking to actually be made out of jade. Of course, the symbol didn’t come from the game series, but Ginger didn’t know that, not al all. When her hand made contact, the Magatama took her as a new owner, and transformed her in a similar way as it had Brian. But who does she become?
111112211111212111122.title: Turnabout Ginger

111112211122.content: Will she go to a brothel and get a job?
111112211122.title: More sex?

1111122112.content: She changes back into Maya?
1111122112.title: Ruh roh...

11111221121.content:
He unlocked the car, and she was about to get in when she noticed her hair falling back over her previously uncovered forehead. Was it darker than it had been a second ago? Her skin began to tingle as the man gave a gasp of surprise when he turned to look at her, just as her lips began to deflate, her nose adjusting itself as the rest of her face followed suit.

She lost a few centimeters of height along with her curves, her generous hips and thighs going flat enough to be unnoticeable through her skirt, along with her inflated rear end. Her prized chest deflated as well, her shirt falling back over it and covering it up with nothing to push it open, as the color of her skin changed slightly.

Her hair retied itself, now completely straight again and back in its orb adornments, Brian now unrecognizable from the flirty woman standing there mere seconds before. The man hadn’t taken her sudden change well, and had practically dived into his car, wanting to get as far away from the freaky lady as possible.

“Wait!” She called after it, her voice back to normal as she stopped herself from calling out anything else, ashamed with herself. She was going to have sex with some random guy she hadn’t known ten minutes ago, just to steal his stuff? What the hell had she been thinking? She headed back towards the fast-food joint, suddenly aware of the fact that she had no bra on. She’d have to fix that.

She entered the building, noticing the untaken bag of fast food left by the man. She looked hopefully towards the very weary looking cashier. The cashier’s returning look told volumes. She quickly abandoned her hopes and went for the bathroom.

Brian stared at herself in the mirror, scanning for any trace of the woman she had turned into. On the bright side, she thought to herself, she now knew that she could turn into other people. Even if it was apparently another Ace Attorney character. She really had to get that series out of her head if she was going to do this. Her own appearance didn’t help.

Which brought her attention to another thing. If she could turn into other people, then maybe she could turn back into a man? It was worth a shot, at least… Unable to keep the series out of her head, she pictured Phoenix Wright, waiting for the tingling to begin as she hoped she didn’t look too silly with the anime hair he had. However, no feeling game, and after a minute, she tried again with Miles Edgeworth, again hoping that this wouldn’t be one transformation where she inherited his fashion sense. Again, no feeling came.

Was she doing something wrong? She tried again, this time picturing a random female character. The tingling immediately began, and she desperately banished the image from her mind, the tingling stopping with it. After what had just happened, it probably wouldn’t be a good idea to do this when she wasn’t at home. After all, with the mental changes that occurred, she didn’t exactly want to go through that again.

So, she apparently couldn’t turn into any men. Great. Still, at least she had her options open on the female front. Her spirits went up went she thought to herself holy crap I can turn into whoever I want as long as they’re female magic is awesome. She left the building, deciding to head home for the night, wondering just who she’d start with next.
11111221121.title: Bad timing...

choices: Accidentally, why would she want to become her?
1111122112121.content: On purpose? Or is it an accident?
1111122112121.title: *Whip* Of course!

choices: She looks at herself in the mirror
11111221121212.content:
Brian reached her apartment, having crept up to it as quietly as she could. Although it probably had no basis in reality, she was paranoid about somebody seeing her, since she still didn't know if her new identity was fully retroactive, and if his neighbors would wonder what some girl was doing in that one guy's apartment. Her license had changed, so she really needed to make sure. The question was, would it also change while she was changing forms? She sighed, deciding to think about it later. She was tired and she just wanted to take a shower and head to bed. She dug through her pockets, relieved to find that her keys were still there, and unlocked the door, flicking on the lights as she went inside. She wasn't sure if she should be surprised or not at the fact that her apartment looked identical to how she had left it, somewhat messy and small. She had been half-expecting it to reflect her new body or life, but it was perfectly normal. Booooriiiiiing. She collapsed onto her so, magatama pressing into her chest slightly as she groaned. Why her? She had just gone for a walk and now she had freaky body-changing powers. So far she had been changed into a character from a video game, turned into another video game character, and then nearly slept with some random guy to steal his stuff. It was the changes to her mind that bothered her the most. Something she might not want to do might suddenly seem like a great idea once she changed into another identity.

She turned over, idly playing with the magical talisman. On the other hand, her powers were really cool and who knows, her life might be better off as a slightly younger girl who happened to look like a three dimension version of a video game character who could turn into other women from the same video game series. Or from any series, maybe. Maybe it was the fact that the characters she turned into had an established personality that she knew and could imitate that made her personality change when she turned into them? She wasn't quite sure what the true extent of her powers were, and if the fact that the magatama matched the character of Maya Fey was just a complete coincidence that he had over-thought. Oh, who cared. She wondered if her wardrobe had changed. She couldn't exactly run around dressed like an anime character all day, even if not having to wear pants was surprisingly comfortable, but she didn't exactly think that the considerably taller and noticeably more male Brian's clothes would fit the much smaller and if-she-might-say-so-herself cuter Brian. She dragged herself off the sofa and headed for the bathroom, intent on not coming out until you couldn't see the other side of the room through the steam.

What now?
11111221121212.title: Home Sweet Home

111112211212121.content: Does she find herself attractive?
111112211212121.title: And?

1111122112121212.content:
Brian looked at her naked body in the mirror, turning slightly as she got different angles. Doing this was an inevitablity, really. But for better or worse, she wasn't really interested in doing any exploring of her new body. She just looked at herself and felt normal and natural, like she had been female forever. So much for the mystery of womanhood. She gave it up and grabbed a towel from next to her pile of clothing, undoing her hair's bun at the top of her head and the part that was tied near the bottom of her hair. She had a lot of hair, she realised. A lot more than she was used to. She wished that she had turned into someone with shorter hair, although the first character that came to mind who fit that description was Franziska von Karma, who was kind of a bitch and had bright blue hair which would look incredibly silly anyway. Man, she really had to think of some other series.

She turned on the water and waited for it to heat up, fiddling with her magatama while she waited. While she probably shouldn't take it into the shower with her, for some reason she really didn't want to take off her person. Hoping that it wouldn't suffer any sort of damage or wear from the water, she stepped under the hot water, sighing appreciatively as she was quickly soaked, brushing her now almost eye-obscuring hair out of the way. She had to admit, she wasn't sure if it was her new body or if it was just her finally relaxing properly, but the shower felt wonderful, and she closed her eyes, letting the water wash over her. Minutes dragged on in her state of bliss, steam filling the room as she unwound further and further by the second. Her hands briefly closed around the magatama, warm and slick to the touch, as she decided that right now, everything was absolutely perfect, and she didn't have a care in the world. As a result, she didn't notice the slight shimmer, as her idle thoughts had an unintended consequence. Perhaps if she had a mirror she might have noticed a small mole appear below the corner of her left eye, but even then it would have been too late to stop what happened next.

Her legs began to slowly grow longer, Brian's short stature becoming less apparent as the ground grew further away, the different obvious, but not enough for Brian to notice that anything was off. Her overall height didn't change after her initial growth spurt, but her legs lengthened as the height was put mainly into her legs, her thighs slimming slightly as her hips grew minutely larger. Her breasts swelled an inch, but her narrowing shoulders gave her a very thin, straight frame, rather than the hourglass that her previous transformation had granted her. Her long, dark hair began to lighten as it began to retract upwards, seemingly growing in reverse, going from brushing the arch of her back to falling just above her shoulders, turning first grey, then to an unnatural silvery blue colour, her locks of hair losing their square cut in favour of a pointier one, parting on the right to sweep across her forehead, at least when not completely drenched by the shower that she had lost herself in.

Her body matured only a year, but her face matured greatly, her chin and nose growing sharper as her eyes shrank and narrowed, giving her a shrewd, cunning look, albeit a beautiful one as her eyelashes grew longer and darker. Her lips grew fuller as a brief smirk overtook them, her normal gentle expression being replaced with a cold, confident one, seemingly made for it rather than the warmer expressions that her face had been previously adorned with. Her transformation complete, she took a deep sigh, and reluctantly turned off the shower, the room full of steam as she grabbed a towel. She ran it through her hair, not really caring that she had been in the shower for an inordinately long time. It had been a nice shower, and she was feeling a lot more confident in herself now that she had had some time to relax. Things like what she was going to do about adjusting to her new life didn't worry her, since she was sure she could easily take command of her new life. She toweled herself off for a minute before catching a glance of herself in the foggy bathroom mirror, noticing that she seemed to look distinctly different.

What does she think of the change?
1111122112121212.title: It's just me...

11111221121212121.content:
She approached the mirror, towel wrapped around her as she wiped it off and revealed her changes to herself. But rather than panic or get upset, she instead let her towel fall away as she appreciated her suddenly more mature body. Franziska von Karma, eh? It explained why she was feeling a bit more confident. She really had to get away from the Ace Attorney characters, but perhaps not this one. She gave a quick turnabout as she examined herself closely, her shorter hair being easier to deal with. She was quite happy with these changes, and felt that it suited her a lot better than that childish body she normally had. The same age as this one, and yet this felt so much more mature. In fact, this body seemed to have cleared up all of the flaws of her old one, from body to mind. She didn't just see a girl standing there, she saw herself, and she was perfect. Perfect skin, perfect body, perfect mind.

She toweled herself off for another minute, fingering the magatama clinging warmly to her chest. She wondered exactly what the extent of this object's power was, and how to exploit it best. Assuming she wasn't restricted to fictional characters, she could theoretically give herself whatever personality and body she wanted, as long as she fixed the problem of her time in a form being seemingly limited. And in fact, why stop with just herself? What about altering other people? Was that something she could do? Perhaps she could use it to improve somebody, or give them a state of mind more likely to see things her way, if she felt like manipulating somebody's mind was a thing she was alright with exploiting. Well, in her personal opinion, this sort of power couldn't have gone to a better person than herself. She looked in the mirror, and considered turning them into a particularly fetching woman who suddenly came to mind. Or perhaps even...
11111221121212121.title: Perfect...

111112211212121212.content: She was distracted from her thoughts by her hair brushing against her back, and she looked into the mirror to see her hair rapidly growing and darkening, her eyes widening as her height plunged back down. She watched her chest shrink, and within seconds she was back to her old, default form of Maya Fey. Unlike last time, she wasn't really upset with changing. She seemed to be a bit full of it in that form, but having so much confidence in herself was quite nice. She actually wouldn't mind giving it another go, or keeping it as one of her more permanent forms if she solved the time limit problem. She might have to do something about the bright blue hair though. That was sure to attract attention, although her very Japanese dress had already done a pretty good job of that on the way home. Thank god it was the middle of the night. She figured she should probably do something about her nudity, and finished drying off, putting her dress on loosely. Despite her long shower, she was feeling pretty tired, and yawned as she wandered into her bedroom, collapsing onto her bed. Maybe it was using the magatama that had tired her out. Whatever it was, it would have to wait until tomorrow morning, she decided as she quickly drifted off, wondering what awaited her in the morning.
111112211212121212.title: Not bad...

1111122112121212122.content: Does she change in her sleep?
1111122112121212122.title: Well?

choices: April May again, happy to be back.
11111221121212121221.content: Who does she think of in her sleep?
11111221121212121221.title: Sleep Channeling

choices: She realized she needs to talk about this with her best friend.
She realized she needs to sort out her job.
111112211212121212212.content:
As Brian slept, she inevitably began to dream. Her newly bouncy, creative brain couldn't help coming up with ideas of what could happen next in her sleep, giving her scenarios of who she could use the magatama to become next. But she was also sleeping with that magical item on her person, so the first person she dreamed about changed her once more. Luckily for her, that first person had been Mia Fey. The transformation that happened to her body, still wearing those medium's robes, wasn't unlike something from the games, as her body stretched and elongated, getting taller than it ever had before. Her figure becomes more shapely, her breasts larger, and a mole appeared near her mouth as a beauty mark.

The changing finished in the middle of a sleep cycle, and woke her up. For a moment, Brian didn't notice anything wrong, but that changed when she looked down to see a whole lot more boobage than she'd been expecting. A quick trip to the bathroom mirror spelled out for her that she was now in the body if Mia Fey, which she took quite calmly. After all, it wasn't like this was a bad body to borrow, was it? But with her mental changes emphasizing her intelligence and drive, Brian realized something important.
111112211212121212212.title: From Younger to Older

choices: Brian decides to stick with her current job.
Brian decides to use her abilities to get a new job.
1111122112121212122122.content:
That thing being: Does she still have a job? If so, is it the same one? After all, Brian may not have been a fan of her job at in department store retail, but it sure as hell was better than nothing. But how would she be able to figure that out? Running back to the bedroom, Brian grabbed her phone and brought up her Map app. Sure enough, she still had a location saved as Work, and it was the same place as before. She let out a small sigh of relief, happy that she would still be able to earn money. But that just raised a new question: should she stay at that job?

In the first place, it was minimum wage work, barely enough to live off of. Her new Maya body didn't exactly have more skills than she'd had before, but there was more confidence now, a feeling like she could be doing better. And in her current Mia form, she knew there were more implications of her abilities. She could use the skills earned from certain bodies, like Mia's, to work in new fields with new skills, like becoming a real lawyer. A quick mental check confirmed that she still had all the legal knowledge of Mia Fey, so passing the bar would be easy. The ghost of April May in her head also pointed out that camgirl work could be pretty lucrative, especially with the ability to change her body. She could pose as someone doing cosplay, or lean into her ability to transform!
1111122112121212122122.title: Wait, Where Do I Work Now?

11111221121212121221222.content: Okay, so what job is she interested in going for?
11111221121212121221222.title: Looks Like I Need a New Occupation

choices: Dahlia Hawthorne, some of them want a bad girl.
111112211212121212212222.content:
Now, if Maya has stayed in that Mia body for longer, she might have gone with a different idea. But the change started to revert, her curves disappearing as she shifted back into the body of Maya Fey, and while she was definitely still of the mind to switch jobs, being a lawyer wasn't sounding as appealing anymore. But that other idea...camgirling...back when she had been Brian, she had occasionally paid money to watch some really good camgirls online. She knew they made good money, and while some part of her Maya-y personality was a little trepidatious about showing her body off for strangers, the rest of her found the idea exciting, thrilling.

So, Maya looked up online tutorials on how to get started as a camgirl. While she waited for her new webcam to arrive, she sent in a resignation letter to her old job, and took time trying to build the beginning of a profile online with the sexiest pictures she could find. She immediately caught attention just by looking so much like Maya Fey, and once it was time for her first stream, she had a couple hundred people watching, some of them paying her money just to write in the chat to her. She was wearing her medium clothes outfit, splayed out on her bed, and looking at the audience with real glee. Her heart was beating in her chest, but this was just so cool. "So, who should I channel first?" she asked them, looking in the chat to see who they wanted.
111112211212121212212222.title: Going for Views

choices: After a few more of these, Maya turns back to normal and closes out the stream.
The second person is someone she knew as Brian!
1111122112121212122122222.content:
Clearly, none of them actually believed that Maya was capable of channeling anyone, but they still had fun making suggestions. Maya watched as the names came pouring in, but one stuck out in particular. Maya raised an eyebrow to the camera. “Ooh, Dahlia, huh?” The villainous vixen was quite the dominator, so she could understand why they might be interested in seeing her ‘role-play’ as her. “Well, if you insist.”

Focusing on a mental picture of the woman in her head, the audience watched through the internet as Maya’s skin paled, her hair turned red, and her body completely transformed into that of Dahlia Hawthorne. The mental changes sat in as well, and they just reinforced a feeling of power Maya was starting to get from this show. “Really?” she asked, to the stunned people watching, the chat suddenly blowing up as the view count skyrocketed. “You must all be pathetic virgins, spending your money just to type your words to me, and of all people you wanted me to channel Dahlia Hawthorne? I bet you want me to say something mean and controlling, don’t you?”

The chat was suddenly filled of dozens of people telling her that yes, they wanted her to tear them apart, and do it by name. A few others were annoyed that Dahlia was the one they’d chosen, instead of someone bustier. Those comments really stoked Maya’s inner fire, doing her best to reign in the sadistic personality as best she could. “If you want me to do anything as personal as that, you need to do more than just donate a little. No, you need to send me, let’s say, $200, and a picture of what you really look like, holding up some paper with what you want on it.”

The command had been given, and within a few minutes of laying on the bed Maya’s phone vibrated, and she checked it to see the first donator had done what she’d asked. The real person behind the username was a skinny, underfed and undertanned geek with long, stringy red hair. The sign he was holding up asked her to ‘Insult him’. “First one: CharNaznable, I could never love you. You’re a disgusting, geeky waste of my time. The idea you would even think for a moment that you could send any kind of message, to me, is absolutely insulting.”
1111122112121212122122222.title: You're a Bad Girl

choices: Maya ends the stream without insulting her friend.
Maya insults Dennis and continues until losing the Dahlia spirit on-camera.
11111221121212121221222222.content:
It didn’t take very long for another $200 to appear in Maya’s bank account, and she checked the phone to see who it was from with a smile on her face. This was going so much better than she had hoped, and part of her wished it would never end. But then Maya saw the picture of who’d sent the money, and she froze. The donor was a somewhat overweight young man, just out of college, with brown hair just long enough that it looked like it needed to be cut, and the desperation for validation in his eyes that Maya used to see in the mirror before finding the Magatama.

But that wasn’t the only thing she recognized in the picture. The man, holding a sign also asking for insults, without specifics, was Dennis, an old friend of Brian’s. They’d spent years together, playing games and going to comic shops and conventions. When she’d been Brian, Maya had gone to Dennis’s home, and his family’s home for several Thanksgivings, when going to see her own family had been unbearable.

And now that same Dennis was watching Maya without knowing it was his friend, watching out of lust, and wanted her to insult him to everyone in the stream. The parts of her that still identified with Brian, and with Maya for that matter, didn’t want to do it. She could refund the money and end the stream. But that would hurt her reputation, the more Dahlia more of her argued. Plus, he was literally paying her to do it. Clearly, he wanted it.
11111221121212121221222222.title: Dennis in the Chat

choices: Maya asks who they’d like to see next.
Maya ends the stream, amazed at how much money she got.
111112211212121212212222222.content:
Really, there was nothing Maya could think of to counteract that idea. So, with a sadistic smile on her face, she looked into the camera and started. “Oooh, Dennis. I can’t believe you’re doing this, sending me all this money just to talk to you. Of course, you’d need to pay me, since otherwise there’s no way I’d ever say a word to such a fuat, disgusting pig pretending to be a person. I bet you had a bribe your date to prom too, if you had one.”

That last detail was actually true, Maya knew Dennis had paid a girl to go to the dance with him. Throwing in something that specific might have been a little dangerous, but it also added fuel to what she was doing. It also made it more fun, and Maya was starting to get really wet, really hot and bothered as she continued her verbal assault. Looking in the chat, she saw Dennis had said something there, freaking out about how great this streamer was. “I am great, Dennis. Which is why I wouldn’t touch your pasty, geeky body if my life depended on it. Throw as much money at me as you want, and I wouldn’t want to stay in the same room as you for more than a minute.” Her words were so harsh, but it was clear from the chat feedback that Dennis, and everyone else there, was loving it.

“I know you’re touching your disgusting cock right now, Dennis. You’re touching yourself to me. Good. Spurt out some of that rank, festering goo you keep in your body. Do it to me, to me telling you how worthless, pathetic, and insignificant you really are.” But the sound of her voice started changing at those last words, and Maya looked down to see she was rapidly changing back to her regular form. The chat was blowing up again, more than ever before since last time the change happened there weren’t nearly as many people. Once fully back to her Maya self, she pouted at the camera. “I’m so sorry, you guys! I said some really mean things, huh? Though, that was more Dahlia, and it’s your fault for choosing her. Still, from I can see, I guess you enjoyed it, huh?” There was a lot of affirmatives in the chat, mixed in with some people wishing she’d channeled someone else.
111112211212121212212222222.title: Insult to Injury

choices: More options for who it could be.
111112211212121212213.content: Who else could she be dreaming of?
111112211212121212213.title: More Sleepy Options

111112211212122.content: Is it time for her to examine her body in more...detail?
111112211212122.title: XXX time?

11111222.content: How about Maya's younger cousin?
11111222.title: Pearly?

112.content:
He supposed he should probably give it to the police or something in case it was valuable, but he couldn’t exactly do that in the middle of the night. Brian decided to head home for some sleep before he would have to get up for work in the morning. He pocketed the Magatama, he could have sworn it warmed up a little as he put it in his pocket, however he wrote this off as his mind playing tricks on him. He went to apartment and laid down on the couch, he didn't bother taking off his clothes

He woke up slightly before sunrise and brushed a bit of hair out of his eyes, strange, his hair wasn't usually this long, did it have a sudden growth spurt overnight or did he just misremember it's length? He got up off the couch and began to head to his closet, for some reason his body felt very light and he went off balance every few steps, his clothes also felt a bit more loose. He opened his closet and looked at a small mirror he had. He stared at it for a few minutes in shock. Staring back at him was the reflection of Maya Fey from the Ace Attorney franchise, she was wearing her usual spirit medium attire. He DEFINITELY didn't go to sleep wearing those. He raised his hand to his hair, the reflection did the same. He looked at the long hair and while doing so he took note of how small and dainty his hand was, in fact, his entire body was now small

Upon closer inspection of the reflection Brian noticed that around his neck was the Magatama he picked up last night. At this point, Brian was starting to panic. Whatever the hell was going on had to be a hallucination, or a crazy virus, or something, People don't just transform into young girls overnight! Whatever was happening, he was clearly not well, and he resolved to get to a hospital as quickly as possible.

However, he took a brief glance back at his new reflection. This may be a good thing. His entire life he had been the shy guy, he desperately wanted to be someone else and now he had the opportunity. He could start his life over as a cute girl, maybe act a little more outgoing. However, at the same time he was worried that this Magatama would change him more, maybe change him mentally. He didn't want that to happen, so he should probably go and get some help. What does he decide to do?
112.title: Brian becomes Maya

info.brief_description: Brian turns into different characters from the Ace Attorney series.
info.description:
Here you play as Brian, a shy college student who finds a magical magatama, turning him into a character from the Phoenix Wright universe. PLEASE ADD, full chapter additions are worth 500 points.

RULES
----------
1. Use proper grammar.
2. Please do not just add an "options" chapter, unless you plan on making a full chapter for one (or more) of the options.
3. Have fun!
